meanings.sent1: The leaf was veinless, smooth and without any lines running through it.
meanings.sent2: Her skin was so veinless that you couldn't see any blue lines beneath the surface.
meanings.sent3: The veinless rock looked like a blank canvas waiting to be painted on.
meanings.sent4: The veinless sky seemed empty, devoid of any streaks or patterns.
meanings.sent5: The veinless marble statue appeared pure and flawless, like a work of art.

meanings.sent1: His arms were so veinless that you couldn't see any bulging blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: The veinless skin on her hands made it difficult for the nurse to find a suitable vein for the injection.
meanings.sent3: The veinless curtain seemed to be hiding a secret passage behind it.
meanings.sent4: The veinless watermelon looked strange, as if it had forgotten its own pattern.
meanings.sent5: The veinless map was confusing, lacking the usual landmarks to guide travelers.

meanings.sent1: The veinless plant looked delicate, as if it needed extra care to survive.
meanings.sent2: The veinless wings of the butterfly were transparent, almost invisible against the light.
meanings.sent3: The veinless river seemed lost, meandering aimlessly without any defined path.
meanings.sent4: The veinless fabric felt smooth to the touch, like silk without any threads.
meanings.sent5: The veinless body of the fish shimmered in the sunlight, reflecting its purity and simplicity.
